description: A running id for unique for each region.
First level of subnational government administration within the Republic of Ghana.

variable_type: Third level administrative unit below district level.

description: Open defecation free (ODF) community. The community is the smallest level of local administration in Ghana (also called unit committees).
Implementing partner of the CLTS (Community-Led Total Sanitation) program in the respective community.
Populationg size of the respective community.
Number of households in the respective community.
Number of toilets in the respective community.
